submission:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        inf=10**9
        h,w=len(grid),len(grid[0])
        dp=[inf]*4
        pre=[inf]*4
        dp[0]=0
        for i in range((h+1)//2):
            for j in range((w+1)//2):
                ij=set()
                ij.add((i,j))
                ij.add((h-1-i,j))
                ij.add((i,w-1-j))
                ij.add((h-1-i,w-1-j))
                cnt=[0,0]
                for ni,nj in ij:
                    cnt[grid[ni][nj]]+=1
                pre,dp=dp,pre
                for r in range(4):
                    dp[r]=min(pre[r]+cnt[1],pre[(r-len(ij))%4]+cnt[0])
        return dp[0]
